action_roll_1_3: Échec - vous êtes contré et en subissez les conséquences.
action_roll_4_5: Réussite partielle - Vous y arrivez mais pas sans conséquences.
action_roll_crit: Critique - Vous y arrivez avec une efficacité augmentée!
aim_desc: Pendant une mission, vous pouvez dépenser des utilisation de Visée pour augmenter le niveau d'effet d'un tir. Cela veut dire que vous pouvez parfois abattre des ennemis plus large ou dangereux d'une seule balle.
alchemical_chembalm_desc: Neutralise la plupart des poisons et toxines.
alchemical_deep_desc: Vous permet de retenir votre respiration pour la durée d'une scène.
alchemical_owlsight_oil_desc: Vision nocturne (24h). Sensitivité à la lumière.
alchemical_rage_venom_desc: Gagnez en puissance physique pour une scène. Vous devez faire un test de résistance mentale pour éviter d'attaquer vos alliés et vos ennemis sans distinction. Addictif.
anchor_desc: Pendant une mission, vous pouvez dépenser des charges de Socle afin de combattre comme si vous étiez un groupe. Cela vous permet de faire face à des groupes de morts-vivants inférieurs sans perte d'effets.
annals_details: Quand un soldat meurt, notez son nom. Quand 4 noms seront notés dans les Annales, la prochaine fois que le temps passe, avant les actions de campagne, prenez un instant pour raconter une histoire et choisissez l'effet qu'elle a sur la Légion.
annals_tale_battle_effect_1: La Légion intervient. Retirez 1 pression, mais le Commandant ne pourra pas avancer durant la prochaine phase.
annals_tale_battle_effect_2: Les soldats se préparent à attaquer rapidement. A la prochaine mission, tous les Spécialistes gagnent +1D pour les jet de manœuvre.
annals_tale_battle_effect_3: Les soldats préparent leurs plus puissantes armes. A la prochaine mission, tous les Spécialistes gagnent +1D aux jets de destruction.
annals_tale_battle_intro: Les morts-vivants ne sont pas la plus grande menaces que la Légion ait affrontée. Laissez moi vous raconter une Histoire d'affrontements impossibles...
annals_tale_battle_q1: Quels terribles pouvoirs possède cette menace ?
annals_tale_battle_q2: Comment le point faible secret de cette menace a été découvert ?
annals_tale_battle_q3: A quel prix la Légion a-t-elle vaincu cet adversaire ?
annals_tale_battle_top: Contez une histoire de Renforcement utilisé en bataille
annals_tale_founding_effect_1: Les soldats comprennent une leçon. Tous les Spécialistes peuvent placer 1 XP dans n'importe quelle catégorie.
annals_tale_founding_effect_2: La Légion chercher la gloire d'antan. La prochaine série de missions comportera une mission spéciale.
annals_tale_founding_effect_3: L'Histoire augmente le moral. La Légion gagne +2 en Moral.
annals_tale_founding_intro: Laissez-moi vous raconter la légende la la fondation de la Légion par le 7ème Empereur, comme décrit il y'a 427 ans dans les premiers Annales...
annals_tale_founding_q1: Qui était le premier Commandant / Légionnaire/ Archiviste ?
annals_tale_founding_q2: Comment (et pour quoi) se souvient-on de cette personne ?
annals_tale_founding_q3: Pour vaincre quelle menace la Légion a-t-elle été fondée ?
annals_tale_founding_top: Raconter une légende sur la fondation de la Légion
annals_tale_independence_effect_1: Les Légionnaires ignorent les blessures. Tous les Spécialistes peuvent marquer une case Soin gratuite.
annals_tale_independence_effect_2: La Légion purifie les cœurs et les esprits. Tous les Légionnaires réduisent leur corruption de 2.
annals_tale_independence_effect_3: Les Soldats font des heures supplémentaires. Ajoutez trois coches à un projet à long-terme.
annals_tale_independence_intro: Après la chut de l'Ancien Empire, la Légion est devenue une compagnie de mercenaire se faisant engagé pour des causes auxquelles elle croyait. Ceci est l'histoire de...
annals_tale_independence_q1: Où est stockée la charte originale de la Légion ?
annals_tale_independence_q2: Quelle(s) restriction(s) inhabituelle(s) est (sont) placée(s) sur les Légionnaires ?
annals_tale_independence_q3: Pour quelle cause la Légion s'est-elle battue précédemment ?
annals_tale_independence_top: Raconter une légende sur l'Indépendance de la Légion
annals_tale_meaning_effect_1: La Légion récompense un soldat exemplaire. Promouvez une Recrue en Soldat.
annals_tale_meaning_effect_2: Les Soldats se souviennent pourquoi ils combattent. A la prochaine session, une mission gagne +2D à son jet d'engagement.
annals_tale_meaning_effect_3: Les Légionnaires se protègent entre eux. A la prochaine mission prioritaire, chaque Spécialiste gagne 1 armure spéciale: n'importe laquelle.
annals_tale_meaning_intro: La Légion n'est plus une simple force militaire, mais une famille forgée dans le sang depuis près d'un siècle. Ceci une une histoire...
annals_tale_meaning_q1: En quoi les civils traitent-ils la Légion différemment des autres unités ?
annals_tale_meaning_q2: Comment les nouvelles recrus sont-elles recrutées dans la Légion?
annals_tale_meaning_q3: Quel serment chaque Légionnaire doit-il prêter ?
annals_tale_meaning_top: Raconter une légende sur le sens de la Légion
annals_tale_will_effect_1: Vos Élus sont émus. Vos Élus gagnent 1 faveur comme s'ils avaient compléter une mission privilégiée.
annals_tale_will_effect_2: N'abandonnez jamais.A la prochaine mission, tous les Légionnaires gagnent +1D à tous leurs jets de résistance.
annals_tale_will_effect_3: Les Soldats s’apprêtent à affronter les sacrilèges. A la prochaine mission, tous les Légionnaires obtiennent +2D en résistance de volonté.
annals_tale_will_intro: Nous avons combattu le sacré et l'impie depuis notre fondation, même durant la Guerre des Dieux, quand les Élus se battaient contre les Élus...
annals_tale_will_q1: Aux côtés de quel(s) Élu(s) la Légion a-t-elle déjà combattue ?
annals_tale_will_q2: Contre quelle menace surnaturelles ont-ils combattu ?
annals_tale_will_q3: Combien ont survécus et comment ont-il rebattit la Légion ?
annals_tale_will_top: Raconter une légende sur la volonté indéfectible de la Légion
back_at_camp_top_1: Après la mission mais avant les actions de campagne, jouez de petites scène sur la vie du camp pendant ou juste après la mission. Souvenez-vous de toujours faire avancer l'histoire (ex. les désertions ou pertes de morales dues aux morts). Explorez les difficultés de la vie itinérantes avec des soldats de différentes cultures.
back_at_camp_top_2: Le MJ choisit un événement ci-dessous en fonction du moral (1-3: bas, 4-7: moyen, 8+: haut). Notez le et décrivez la scène. Si tous les événements ont une marque, utilisez ce qui sui entre parenthèses (la vie à la guerre et sur les route finit par fatiguer tout le monde). Demandez au Maréchal le nom d'un Légionnaire approprié si vous ne savez pas qui est présent.
back_at_camp_top_3: Les ordres sont de laisser libre cours à son inspiration. Une expérimentation sur un mort-vivant peut être une tentative d'un soldat pour soigner un camarade corrompu, gardé enchaîné dans sa tente. Des réfugiés peuvent chercher protection, nourriture ou être des ambassadeurs de colonies voisines.
broken_blighter_info: Aussi appelé l'Infâme et Corrupteur de Chair.
broken_breaker_info: Aussi appelé Briseur de Tempête ou l'Annonciateur de Tonnerre.
broken_render_info: Aussi appelé L’Équarrisseur ou le Chevalier Creux.
broken_xp_clock: Une pointeuse est remplie (voir la fiche du Commandant).
broken_xp_first: En premier, vous sélectionnez votre Brisé.
broken_xp_top: Votre Brisé gagne une nouvelle Capacité de Brisé quand...
camp_event_high_1: Les soldats organisent une commémoration pour les morts.
camp_event_high_2: Un jeune soldats fait exploser des munitions, encouragé par les autres.
camp_event_high_3: Les tempêtes assombrissent les cieux. Les rumeurs et spéculations se répandent rapidement.
camp_event_high_4: Des caisses disparaissent des stocks, mais personne ne veut avouer savoir pourquoi.
camp_event_high_5: Une escouade parle de sa ville natale et demande à leur capitaine de leurs parler de la sienne.
camp_event_high_6: Votre Élu se mure dans le silence et refuse de parler à qui que ce soit.
camp_event_low_1: Une plaie purulente cachée par un soldat est découverte.
camp_event_low_2: Quelques fournitures médiales ont disparues. Les blessés se lamentent.
camp_event_low_3: Des expérimentations sur des morts-vivants sont découvertes sur le camp.
camp_event_low_4: Des cris se font entendre au loin à toutes heures, empêchant tout repos.
camp_event_low_5: Une escouade affamée se résolvant à faire de la cueillette devient gravement malade.
camp_event_low_6: un déserteur est attrapé avant sa fuite. Un jugement doit être rendu.
camp_event_medium_1: Une bagarre éclate à cause d'un vol entre Légionnaire.
camp_event_medium_2: Après une attaque de mort-vivant, la Légion doit défaire le camps et s'installer ailleurs.
camp_event_medium_3: Un soldat est arrêté pour avoir vendu des fournitures aux locaux en échanges de faveurs.
camp_event_medium_4: Des nouvelles de dévastation arrivent d'un autre front.
camp_event_medium_5: Une escouade refuse de retourner au combat tant que leur capitaine n'est pas remplacé.
camp_event_medium_6: Un groupe de réfugiés débarque dans le camp et supplie qu'on les aide.
campaign_action_acquire_assets_boosted: Augmentez le résultat d'un niveau. Vous pouvez dépenser plusieurs provisions.
campaign_action_acquire_assets_desc: Empruntez, volez ou suppliez pour un atout dont vous avez besoin. Faites un jet de localisation pour déterminer la qualité de l'atout (1-3: Médiocre. 4-5: Standard. 6: Excellente. critique: Exceptionnelle). Les travailleurs, machines de sièges et concoctions alchimique sont de qualité Excellente. Les alchimistes et les miséricordes sont de qualité Exceptionnelle.
campaign_action_liberty_boosted: Les Légionnaires se débarrassent de tout stress. Augmentez le moral de la Légion par 4 (global).
campaign_action_liberty_desc: Des permissions sont données aux Légionnaires pour quelques jours; de la bonne nourriture et des boissons sont distribuées et les feux de camps autorisés. Durant cette période, les Légionnaires sont libres de faire la fête, fraterniser et se relâcher comme ils veulent. Chaque personnage se débarrasse de 3 stress maximum. Augmentez le moral de la Légion de 2.
campaign_action_long_term_project_booste: Augmentez le résultat d'un niveau. Vous pouvez dépenser plusieurs provisions.
campaign_action_long_term_project_desc: Travaillez sur un projet à long terme si vous en avez les moyens. Choisissez un Spécialiste pour diriger le projet. Il font un jet pour les actions et avance du nombre de segment correspondant sur l'horloge du projet en fonction des résultats (1-3: un. 4-5: deux. 6: trois. critique: cinq). Vous pouvez faire cette action de campagne plusieurs fois, mais seulement sur différents projets à chaque fois.
campaign_action_recruit_boosted: Deux de ces Recrues sont remplacées par des Soldats (les 3 autres restent des Recrues).
campaign_action_recruit_desc: La guerre n'a laissée que des soldats rampants vers chez eux et des mercenaires gardant des villages ou des routes - ou les pillers. Vous recrutez ces reclus, ces rejets et ces guerriers sur le tard pour servir dans les rangs de la Légion. Gagnez 5 Novices pour que le Maréchal regonfle ses rangs.
campaign_action_rest_and_recuperation_bo: Chaque Légionnaire gagne une seconde coche en soin.
campaign_action_rest_and_recuperation_de: Laissez le temps au soldats de se reposer et de panser leurs blessures. Chaque Légionnaire marque une coche dans n'importe quelle ligne de blessure. Quand une ligne est pleine, effacez les coches et blessures de cette ligne. Si vous avec une blessure de Miséricorde, un Spécialiste gagne une coche de soin en plus. Enfin, soignez n'importe quelle Miséricorde avant cette action de récupération.
campaign_actions_desc: Après les missions, effectuez des actions de campagnes en fonction du moral (demandez au Maréchal). Faites des actions supplémentaires en dépensant des provisions, une provision par action. Dépensez une provision pour améliorer une action en plus de son coût de base. Vous pouvez faire les actions une seule fois par phase de campagne ( sauf acquisition d'atouts et projets à long-terme).
channels_desc: Vous pouvez dépenser des utilisations de canaux pour acquérir des atouts pour votre escouade dans un flashback. Faites un jet d'influence pour déterminer leur qualité. Vous pouvez dépenser plus d'utilisations pour augmenter la qualité selon les règles de provisions. Ces atouts sont temporaire ou "prêtés" et disparaîtront à la fin de la mission.
chat_image: Image à afficher avec les jets de dés dans le chat
chosen_xp_first: En premier, vous sélectionnez votre Élue.
chosen_xp_four: Vous complétez 4 missions du type de faveur de votre Élue.
chosen_xp_top: Votre Élue gagne une nouvelle Capacité d'Élu quand...
consort_desc: Côtoyez des amis, des contacts ou des liens avec votre héritage et passé pour avoir accès à des ressources, informations, aides ou lieux. Faites bonne impression.
desertion_desc: Désertion: Si vous perdez du moral mais n'en avez plus, des soldats désertent (1 par moral que vous ne pouvez pas payer). Vous perdez d'abord les Recrues puis les Soldats. Si vous avez moins de 3 escouades complètes, terminez le jeu. La Légion n'est plus.
discipline_desc: Disciplinez un autre soldat; ordonnez l'obéissance par la force de la personnalité; intimidez ou menacez.
divine_ability_abominable_science_desc: Les chirurgiens des Putrides ont appris à suturer des cadavres ensemble de manière fonctionnelle. L'horreur peut apparaître dans n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_anointed_horned_desc: Les missions Sacrées, Mystiques et Sauvages donnent toutes des faveurs de mission. Commencez avec une faveurs pré-remplie.
divine_ability_anointed_shreya_desc: Les missions Sacrées, Mystiques et Miséricordieuses donnent toutes des faveurs de mission. Commencez avec une faveurs pré-remplie.
divine_ability_anointed_zora_desc: Les missions Sacrées, Mystiques et de Gloire donnent toutes des faveurs de mission. Commencez avec une faveurs pré-remplie.
divine_ability_asrika’s_blessing_desc: Les Légionnaires subissent toujours 1 corruption de moins.
divine_ability_asrika’s_mercy_desc: Quand la Légion récupère, donnez une coche de soin supplémentaire à chaque Légionnaire.
divine_ability_asrika’s_tears_desc: Quand vous êtes en deuil, vous ressentez un profond sentiment de paix. Les actions de campagne de Liberté donnent +1 en moral et -1 en stress.
divine_ability_attrition_strategies_desc: Les farfadets attaquent et empoisonnent les lignes logistiques. Les jets d'engagement en missions d'approvisionnement subissent -1D de malus.
divine_ability_battle-saint_desc: Shreya a un niveau de menace de 5 et est efficace contre tout les ennemis.
divine_ability_blood_of_fire_desc: Lorsque vous dépensez des Provisions Sacrées, tous les légionnaires s'équipent d'Huile de Feu (1 charge).
divine_ability_blood_of_the_chosen_desc: En dépensant des Provisions Sacrées, vous obtenez également des armes de mêlées sanctifiées pour cette mission. C'est efficace contre les morts-vivants. Commencez avec 1 Provision Sacrée gratuite.
divine_ability_book_of_hours_desc: Tous les spécialistes commencent avec 2 rangs supplémentaires d'actions.
divine_ability_cruel_gluttony_desc: Les Putrides créent des fluides qui distillent de l'acide à l'intérieur des morts-vivants. Les Sac d'Entrailles peuvent apparaitre durant n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_dark_visions_desc: Les Broyeurs maudissent la Légion avec d'horribles cauchemars hurlant. Les Temps Libres restaurent 1 Stress en moins.
divine_ability_defilement_desc: La profanation de sites religieux par les Broyeur a diminué l'influence sainte dans cette région. Les jet d’enrôlement des missions Religieuse perdent 1D.
divine_ability_forced_march_desc: Les Troupes de l’Accablé poussent vers l'avant, enragées. Ajoutez 3 marques à l'horloge (Commandant).
divine_ability_forest’s_wings_desc: When you spend Religious Supply on a mission, squads bring up to 3 animals that can whisper messages to each other and to camp.
divine_ability_fury_desc: L'Accablé apprend à rependre sa haine au milieu de ses troupes. Les Efflanqués peuvent maintenant bouger rapidement et agir avec ruse si leurs Élites meurent.
divine_ability_great_hunter_desc: The Quartermaster may select a training campaign action. Each Specialist may mark 3 insight xp.
divine_ability_heart_of_heroes_desc: All Legionnaires add the xp trigger: If you engaged a higher threat opponent by yourself.
divine_ability_heartless_desc: L'Accablé accordent de la puissance à ceux qui se dépèce le cœur. Les Sans-Cœur peuvent apparaitre durant n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_hide_of_the_white_hind_de: All Specialists can speak to and understand wild beasts.
divine_ability_horned_god’s_bounty_desc: When time passes, ask if the Legion will advance. If it does, do not spend Food.
divine_ability_horned_god’s_eyes_desc: If there is a Panyar Specialist on a recon mission, add +1d to the engagement roll.
divine_ability_horned_god’s_thews_desc: Legionnaires can spend special armor to resist physical consequences, or to push themselves on any prowess action.
divine_ability_living_god’s_fury_desc: The Quartermaster may spend Religious Supply before an assault mission to add +1d on the engagement roll. Legionnaires equip both Reliquaries and Black Shot.
divine_ability_living_god’s_kiss_desc: During a rest and recuperation campaign action, each Legionnaire removes 2 corruption in addition to healing.
divine_ability_living_god’s_vigor_desc: Specialists can take an extra level 2 harm (3 total).
divine_ability_massacre_desc: Les stratégies sauvages et les profanation de corps de l'Accablé distille la peur chez tout les soldats. Les jets d’enrôlement pour les missions d'assaut perdent 1D.
divine_ability_modern_warfare_desc: Les Troupes des Putrides portent des armures et armes appropriées.
divine_ability_nature’s_fury_desc: Les Broyeurs et Sorcières peuvent maudire la nature, couvrant les troupes de brouillards et de tempêtes, animant les arbres durant les combats.
divine_ability_pillar_of_skulls_desc: Les Broyeurs font un pilier de corps gémissant pour invoquer et corrompre des Bêtes sacrées. Les Dévoreurs peuvent apparaitre durant n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_sacred_seals_desc: All Legionnaires gain special armor versus magical effects.
divine_ability_scars_of_war_desc: Les Troupes des Putrides peuvent corrompre le sol. Des brouillards de poisons apparaissent et détruisent la nature. Bien qu'étant parfois absent, cela peut apparaitre rapidement comme la conséquence d'un jet.
divine_ability_shapeshifter_desc: Gain 1 intel after completing 2 primary missions.
divine_ability_shredders_desc: Les Vestiges d'Épines, ces boules de lames et de sang de l'Accablé, explosent lorsque les troupes sont proches. Souvent enterrées dans le sol ou jetées sur les escouades.
divine_ability_spearforge_desc: Render smiths massive, bladed, corrupting, black-iron spears that Heartless carry and Knights fire from ballistae.
divine_ability_star_of_the_dawn_desc: When you advance, roll pressure as if 1 lower.
divine_ability_storm_riding_desc: Les Sorcières des Ombres apprennent à utiliser les forces électriques à l'intérieur des Brulés pour sauter de corps en corps, leur permettant d'échapper à la mort.
divine_ability_the_changing_curse_desc: Les Sorcières des Ombres corrompent les vivants. Les Transformés peuvent apparaitre durant n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_the_coven_desc: Les Broyeurs lient des âmes maudites à des corps encore vivant pour créer des acolytes. Les Sorcières des Ombres peuvent apparaitre durant n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_the_forge_desc: Render forges blades of the fallen and cinderblood into Elites. Thorns can appear in any mission.
divine_ability_the_sworn_desc: Some oaths transcend death. Knights of the Black Oak can appear in any mission.
divine_ability_toxic_bile_desc: Gut-Sacks and Spitters cause corrupting wounds. At the end of a mission, untreated corrupting wounds cause +1 corruption each.
divine_ability_toxic_mutagen_desc: Les Troupes des Putrides couvrent leurs armes d'une huile alchimique causant +1 Corruption quand ils blessent une cible.
divine_ability_violent_emulsion_desc: Les Putrides modifient des morts-vivants pour surproduire des sucs gastriques. Des Cracheurs peuvent apparaitre durant n'importe quelle mission.
divine_ability_war-saint_desc: The Quartermaster may select a training campaign action. Each Specialist may mark 3 resolve xp.
divine_ability_wild_awakening_desc: Les Sorcières des Ombres et les Broyeurs peuvent maudire des animaux pour en faire des espions ou des meutes pour les Transformées.
doctor_desc: While on a mission, you may spend doctor uses to treat a fellow Legionnaire so they ignore all wound penalties for a scene. Level 4 harm is still lethal.
duties_commander_1: Track Time and Pressure. Pressure and time increase when time passes or for certain mission penalties. Pressure decreases from some mission, and advancing resets it to zero. Time (rarely) decreases as a result of select missions.
duties_commander_2: Track Location and Movement. Decide when the Legion advances. You may never backtrack. Mark the Legion position and route on your map. When you advance, roll pressure minus Horses uses spent, and add time based on the roll. (1-3: One. 4/5: Two. 6: Three. crit: Five)
duties_commander_3: Track and Spend Intel. Spend intel to add +1d to mission engagement rolls or gain access to a special mission at your location. Ask intel questions before each mission. Intel can be gained from mission rewards.
duties_commander_4: Pick Missions. Decide on a type of mission to focus on (assault, recon, religious, or supply) and tell the GM. The GM will tell you what’s available. Pick two missions to perform and designate one “primary,” to be played out at the table. The other is secondary and resolved with an engagement roll. If you were presented with a third mission, you automatically fail it.
duties_commander_5: Work with Other Roles. Consult with the rest of the players to make thebest decisions you can, but you have the final say in the duties you are tasked with. The fate of the Legion is in your hands. Good luck.
duties_lorekeeper_1: Track the Dead. Note every Legionnaire that dies. The book weighs heavy, but while there is still a Legion, you have a sacred duty to remember all sacrifices.
duties_lorekeeper_2: Tell the Tales of the Legion. When four new names are added to your lists of the dead, tell a Tale of the Legion. Answer all questions the Tale asks in your story, then choose one benefit to the troops. The first five tales in that order.
duties_lorekeeper_3: Keep the Annals. Note missions, who is sent, and their outcomes. If there is any question what happened, it is your duty to recall it for others. Keep these books safe. If you’ve kept the Annals faithfully through the end of the campaign, and they’ve reached Skydagger Keep safely, add 10 points to your final score.
duties_lorekeeper_4: Set Back at Camp Scenes. Consult with the Marshal on morale before making your selection. If a decision needs to be made about the camp or its rules, you will make them.
duties_lorekeeper_5: Work with Other Roles. Advise the other Roles as necessary. Keep in mind the Legion’s beliefs and lessons you have set, and remind them.
duties_marshal_1: Track Morale. Morale increases during the liberty campaign action, and from mission rewards. It decreases from mission penalties, when soldiers die (-1 per), and when there isn’t supply (-1) or Food (-2) when it must be spent.
duties_marshal_2: Assign Who Goes On And Leads Missions. Decide who goes on missions. Missions take 1 squad and up to 2 Specialists by default. If there’s an Officer on a mission, they’re in charge. Otherwise, you say who’s in charge.
duties_marshal_3: Track Squads and Specialists. Between missions, keep the playbooks. Mark losses, harm, stress, advancement, and promotions. Name squad members as needed. Detail any Specialists the Legion gains.
duties_marshal_4: Make Engagement Rolls. It’s your duty to roll.
duties_marshal_5: Ensure Legionnaires Advance. Make sure the group remembers to track xp after missions. Secondary missions grant 2 xp to Specialists regardless of outcome.
duties_marshal_6: Work with Other Roles. Consult with others to make the best decisions you can, but you have the final say in the duties you are tasked with.
duties_quartermaster_1: Track and Spend Supply. You gain supply primarily from supply mission rewards. Spend supply for additional campaign actions or to boost a campaign action. When the Commander advances the Legion, lose any supply you can’t take with you (maximum 3 supply, plus 1 per Supply Cart).
duties_quartermaster_2: Perform Campaign Actions. Between mission phases, perform a number of campaign actions according to troop morale. Ask the Marshal how many you get.
duties_quartermaster_3: Track and Use Materiel and Non-Legion Personnel. Expend materiel to make missions more successful. Track Mercy and Alchemist statuses, such as wounds and corruption. Work on projects to change the position of the Legion.
duties_quartermaster_4: Work with Other Roles. Consult with the rest of the players to make the best decisions you can, but you have the final say in the duties you are tasked with. The fate of the Legion is in your hands. Good luck.
duties_spymaster_1: Dispatch Spies. Dispatch spies on assignments during campaign actions. Simple assignments complete immediately (though interrogation takes place right before missions). Long-term assignments take time to finish, and different spies may take turns working on them.
duties_spymaster_2: Grow Your Network. Your true enemies are the Broken. Prepare for them.
duties_spymaster_3: Work with Other Roles. Consult with the other Roles to make the best decisions you can, but you have the final say in the duties you are tasked with. The fate of the Legion is in your hands. Good luck.
duties_top: Your Duties. During the game, do the following:
engagement_assault_1: Weapons. Did the Quartermaster equip the soldiers with Black Shot? Take +1d.
engagement_assault_2: Wounds. Is any Legionnaire starting the mission wounded? Take -1d.
engagement_assault_top: Assault Mission. On each assault mission, also ask the following:
engagement_desc: Engagement rolls determine unit disposition at the start of a primary mission and the outcome of secondary missions. As the one sending troops into battle, it’s the Marshal’s duty to assemble the dice and make the engagement rolls.
engagement_details: The Marshal assembles and rolls dice for engagements.
engagement_outcome_1-3: 1-3. Primary Mission: You’re in a desperate position when the action starts. Secondary Mission: You fail the mission, lose 3 squad members, and all Specialists take level 3 harm.
engagement_outcome_4-5: 4/5. Primary Mission: You’re in a risky position when the action starts. Secondary Mission: Fail the mission or you can succeed, two squad members die, and all Specialists take level 2 harm.
engagement_outcome_6: 6. Primary Mission: You’re in a controlled position when the action starts. Secondary Mission: You succeed at the mission, all Specialists take level 1 harm, and you may choose to lose 2 squad members to promote a Rookie to Soldier.
engagement_outcome_critical: Critical. Primary Mission: You’ve overcome the first obstacle and are in a controlled position at the next. Secondary Mission: You succeed at the mission, and promote one squad member (see Rookie/Soldier special abilities for details).
engagement_primary_1_3: You’re in a desperate position when the action starts.
engagement_primary_4_5: You’re in a risky position when the action starts.
engagement_primary_6: You’re in a controlled position when the action starts.
engagement_primary_crit: You’ve overcome the first obstacle and are in a controlled position at the next.
engagement_question_1: Legion Loyalty. Are all on the mission oathsworn to the Legion? Take +1d.
engagement_question_2: Did the Commander spend 1 intel to give you foresight and info? Take +1d.
engagement_question_3: Veteran. Is everyone on the mission a Specialist or Soldier? Take +1d.
engagement_question_4: Leadership. Does any Legionnaire distrust the leadership or not fear them enough to obey orders on the battlefield? Take -1d.
engagement_question_5: Parameters. Are required Specialists or equipment not on the mission? Take -1d.
engagement_question_top: Before Every Mission. Assemble the engagement roll by asking the following:
engagement_recon_1: Speed. Did the Quartermaster spend Horses to equip the mission? Take +1d.
engagement_recon_2: Stealth. Is any Legionnaire starting with heavy load? Take -1d.
engagement_recon_top: Recon Mission. On each recon mission, also ask the following:
engagement_religious_1: Arcane. Did the Quartermaster send Religious Supplies to ward and protect the Legionnaires? Take +1d.
engagement_religious_2: Corruption. Is any Legionnaire starting with blight? Take -1d.
engagement_religious_top: Religious Mission. On each religious mission, also ask the following:
engagement_secondary_1_3: You fail the mission, lose 3 squad members, and all Specialists take level 3 harm.
engagement_secondary_4_5: Fail the mission or you can succeed, two squad members die, and all Specialists take level 2 harm.
engagement_secondary_6: You succeed at the mission, all Specialists take level 1 harm, and you may choose to lose 2 squad members to promote a Rookie to Soldier.
engagement_secondary_crit: You succeed at the mission, and promote one squad member.
engagement_supply_1: Supplies. Did the Quartermaster spend Food to equip the mission? Take +1d.
engagement_supply_2: Enemies. Is the current pressure higher than 2? Take -1d.
engagement_supply_top: Supply Mission. On each supply mission, also ask the following:
further_annals: When all Tales are told, and four more names enter your Annals, you may tell any Tale—but each can only be told once until all types of Tales are told once again.
gain_morale_2: Liberty. Whenever the Quartermaster chooses the liberty campaign action.
grit_desc: You may spend grit uses to add +2d to a resistance roll. The grit use must be spent before the roll. You may only spend 1 grit use this way per roll.
intel_desc: INTEL: Spend 1 intel to add +1d to any engagement roll, or to access a special mission in a location in addition to your mission priorities. Gain intel from Recon mission rewards. Before you pick primary and secondary missions, ask intel questions based on how much intel you hold.
intel_details: A measure of how much you know about undead movements and the war
long_term_assignments_desc: During campaign actions, spies may be given long-term assignments. Only 1 spy may be sent on each assignment. Roll 1d for trained spies (2d for masters). Advance according to results. 1-3: 1 tick, and the spy is wounded. 4/5: 2 ticks. 6: 3 ticks. crit: 5 ticks. A wounded spy that is wounded again dies.
lose_morale_1: Missions. Penalties for failure or loss.
lta_augument_missions_complete: Next GM mission generation, tell them to add +1 to the rewards and mission penalty rolls on one mission of the Commander’s focus type. That type must appear once.
lta_augument_missions_desc: Use contacts to bolster the Commander’s mission selection.
lta_expand_network_complete: Choose a new spy network advancement connected to any piece of the network you have.
lta_expand_network_desc: Take the time to build contacts, informants, and local resources in the area, and expand and hone your spies’ effectiveness.
lta_lay_trap_complete: The next mission list will include an assault mission to attack a specific Lieutenant or Infamous.
lta_lay_trap_desc: Goad an undead with a known weakness or desire into exposing themselves to attack.
lta_recruit_complete: If you’ve lost a spy, add one to the roster. You can only have 2 spies at a time, or 3 if you have Acquisition in your spy network.
lta_recruit_desc: Spies lead dangerous lives. Sometimes you have to recruit more.
lta_research_complete: Learn all the special missions in a location, and if the Commander spends an intel to acquire one, you may pick which to do. If you move past the location, reset the clock.
lta_research_desc: Undercover spies research an area for high-reward missions.
maneuver_desc: Maneuver into position and traverse obstacles; climb, swim, run, jump, and tumble; handle a pack animal; ride a mount.
marshal_desc: Marshal a squad or larger group to action; command attention amidst chaos; coordinate fire on a target.
materiel_details: Each box of resources has 3 uses (circles) by default.
morale_campaign_actions_desc:
Each campaign phase, gain campaign actions based on morale.
1-3: None. 4-7: One. 8-10: Two.
name: Name
pick_one_kit: Pick one: Medic, Climbing, Cooking, Repair, Soldier’s, or Wrecking.
playbook_ability_against_the_darkness_de: You and all squadmates that can see you gain +1d to resist fear and corruption.
playbook_ability_akimbo_desc: When dueling at close range with two pistols, gain potency.
playbook_ability_ambush_desc: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.
playbook_ability_attache_desc: You may deploy on any mission, even outside the usual Specialist caps. Gain this ability for free when you become a Medic.
playbook_ability_backup_desc: When you protect a squadmate, resist with +1d. When you assist someone, their pushes only cost 1 stress.
playbook_ability_bulwark_desc: You can spend anchor uses as special armor against consequences to a squad you are defending.
playbook_ability_cavalry_desc: If the Quartermaster has Horses uses available, all members of your squad start missions with mounts. You gain +1d to maneuver while mounted.
playbook_ability_chemist_desc: You have training in Orite alchemical medicine. You may equip an Alchemical Bandolier on each mission.
playbook_ability_cover_fire_desc: If you set up someone with shoot or provide covering fire, they gain potency on their next action.
playbook_ability_crimson_shot_desc: You’re authorized to bring one Crimson Seeker shell on missions. Firing it counts as a threat 4 attack, and you must mark a trauma.
playbook_ability_daredevil_desc: When you make a desperate roll, gain +1d.
playbook_ability_devils_own_luck_desc: You gain +1d to all resistance rolls. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance.
playbook_ability_doctor_feelgood_desc: Spend 1 use of Tonics to grant one person potency for a physical action.
playbook_ability_eat_iron_shit_nails_des: When you push yourself, you may ignore all harm penalties. Also take +1d to resist the consequence of any roll you pushed yourself on.
playbook_ability_elite_desc: Gain mastery of 2 abilities (they can go up to rank 4).
playbook_ability_every_inch_a_desc: You start with all the traits from your heritage. If taken as a Veteran advance, it must be the first ability selected at character creation.
playbook_ability_field_dressing_desc: At the end of a mission you may expend remaining doctor uses to add 1 check to a Legionnaire’s level 2 or 3 harm, once per person.
playbook_ability_first_aid_desc: You can spend 1 use of Tonics to remove appropriate level 1 harm from any one person on your mission.
playbook_ability_ghost_desc: You can spend scrounge uses as special armor against traps or detection.
playbook_ability_gotta_make_it_out_alive: You can take 1 additional trauma before dying. When you promote, replace this ability with a level of Survivor. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance.
playbook_ability_grenadier_desc: You have had explosives training and can always bring a grenade (1 load) or explosive charges (2 load) as part of your light load.
playbook_ability_hard_knocks_desc: Mark 2 xp in any category at the end of any mission where you took level 2 harm or higher. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance.
playbook_ability_hardened_desc: You can mark 2 additional stress boxes.
playbook_ability_home_cooking_desc: If a mission takes multiple days, use your Fresh Food. Say what you cook. Everyone in the squad that partakes clears 1 stress. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance.
playbook_ability_infiltrator_desc: When you gather info through clandestine observation, or attempt to bypass traps and security measures, gain potency.
playbook_ability_iron_will_desc: You can spend grit uses as special armor vs. fear, paralysis, corruption, and fatigue.
playbook_ability_jack_of_all_trades_desc: Increase 2 zero-ranked skills to rank 1. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance.
playbook_ability_just_a_kid_desc: When someone suffers harm when protecting you, they mark xp. When you promote, choose a second special ability from your new playbook to replace this one. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance.
playbook_ability_lead_from_the_front_des: Whenever you lead a group action, improve scale up or down one level (for example: a small group counts as a medium group or an individual). If you lead a group action in combat, you may count multiple 6s from different rolls as a critical.
playbook_ability_like_the_wind_desc: Whenever there’s a question of who goes first, the answer is you. Also take +1d when resisting attacks with prowess.
playbook_ability_loaded_for_bear_desc: When selecting load, you may select 4 utility load instead of 2.
playbook_ability_logistical_support_desc: Channels uses can be spent to assist a squadmate. When you do this, they get an additional +1d. Tell us how your preparation or supplies help them against this threat or obstacle.
playbook_ability_mission_first_desc: Add the following to "at the end of mission" xp triggers: If anyone died under your command.
playbook_ability_moral_support_desc: You know how to keep troop spirits up. Once a mission, if you tell a funny, personal, or meaningful story when the squad is resting, anyone listening may clear 1 stress.
playbook_ability_not_a_rookie_anymore_de: You are promoted! You become a Soldier. Gain 1 special ability and 1 rank of Grit. You must take this as your first playbook advance. This ability cannot be taken as a Veteran advance or a starting ability.
playbook_ability_not_today_desc: You can spend a doctor use on a Legionnaire who has taken level 4 harm on a mission, but you must do so quickly before they die. You treat them and reduce the wound to level 3 harm instead.
playbook_ability_notches_desc: If you land the killing blow on a threat 2 or higher opponent, mark 1 xp in any category.
playbook_ability_obedience_desc: An NPC squadmate sacrifices themselves, on your orders. They die, and absorb all the harm for you or another Specialist from one attack. Remember that the Legion takes -1 morale each time this occurs.
playbook_ability_officer_school_desc: You’re well educated and know arcane esoterica. Gain +1d when gathering info through research and when resisting with insight.
playbook_ability_one_eye_desc: You’ve replaced an eye with an alchemical construct. You can see invisible targets clearly and identify supernatural forces.
playbook_ability_over_the_top_desc: When you charge into the teeth of an enemy that outnumbers or outguns you, clear 1 stress and take +1d to maneuver.
playbook_ability_panther-like_grace_desc: When you are quick and carrying no armor, any harm you take starts as 1 level lower.
playbook_ability_ready_for_anything_desc: When being ambushed, your flashbacks cost 0 stress and you gain potency to all actions during those flashbacks. You also take 1 less level of harm on secondary missions.
playbook_ability_relentless_desc: You may spend grit uses to push yourself.
playbook_ability_sharpshooter_desc: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what’s normal for the weapon — unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy.
playbook_ability_sixth_sense_desc: You just know when there are undead nearby. You always know what the highest threat level of undead is in the area. You can gather info on them with resolve.
playbook_ability_specialist_training_des: You promote to a Specialist. Make a new playbook: mark 1 special ability and a rank of the starting Specialist action.
playbook_ability_strategist_desc: You gain +1d to sway when acquiring assets for a mission via channels uses. You also get +1d to the engagement roll for a mission.
playbook_ability_survivor_desc: You can take +1 trauma before dying.
playbook_ability_tactician_desc: You anticipate problems others would never see coming. When you lead a group action you may suffer at most 1 stress.
playbook_ability_tenacious_desc: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).
playbook_ability_veteran_desc: Take a special ability from another source.
playbook_ability_vigorous_desc: When you check wounds during rest and recuperation, place one free check. When you take harm, clear 1 stress.
playbook_ability_war_machine_desc: When you push yourself you can do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman — reduce the threat level of all the enemies you’re facing by one.
playbook_ability_weaponmaster_desc: You’re known as a Weaponmaster even outside the Legion. When you push yourself, you also gain potency in melee combat.
pressure_desc: PRESSURE: When you advance, roll pressure minus Horses uses spent, and add time below. (1-3: One. 4/5: Two. 6: Three. crit: Five) Then reset pressure to 0. Add pressure when time passes (after campaign actions), or when there is a pressure penalty for a failed mission.
pressure_details: A measure of how surrounded you are by undead
pressure_instructions: Add time according to the result. (1-3: One. 4/5: Two. 6: Three. Crit: Five)
research_desc: Research a person, document, or item with close scrutiny to gather information and apply knowledge; gain a deeper understanding.
resist_instructions: Suffer 6 stress minus the highest die result. When you roll a critical on resistance, clear 1 stress.
rig_desc: Rig together mechanical solutions; disable, repair, or create mechanisms; disable a trap, pick a lock; build fortifications; repair siege weapons.
rookie_promotion_desc: Your Rookie is no longer a Rookie and will now become a soldier! This will give you one rank of Grit; you are also eligible to choose a special ability after promotion.
scout_desc: Scout a location or situation to gather information; move or observe without being noticed; spot weaknesses or exploits if there are any to be seen.
scrounge_desc: While on a mission, you may spend scrounge uses to find safe and secure shelter or one load worth of supplies for everyone in your squad.
shoot_desc: Shoot a target with precision from a distance; find a perch with clear lines of fire; make trick shots.
simple_assignments_1: Recover. The spy heals and recuperates. Remove their wounded condition.
simple_assignments_2: Interrogate. Ask the Commander for the intel questions list. Your spy is sent on a mission and can answer one question from any list (regardless of the Commander’s intel total) whenever missions are presented by the GM.
simple_assignments_3: Blackmail. Spy bribes or threatens as needed. Add +1d to an acquire assets roll.
simple_assignments_4: Help. Spy bribes or threatens as needed. Add +1d to a long-term project roll.
simple_assignments_top: During campaign actions, you can assign spies to simple assignments. Spies on simple assignment cannot undertake long-term assignments.
skirmish_desc: Skirmish with an opponent in close combat; assault a position; brawl and wrestle; fire pistols at short range.
soldier_promotion_desc: You are about to promote this Soldier to a Specialist. In order to become a Specialist of a certain kind, all starting action ratings must be greater than or equal to the action ratings of a starting Specialist of this type. You gain a rank in the corresponding Specialist ability, up to a maximum of 3.
spy_antoinette_desc: Denied nobility by birth, this Orite seamstress found a better calling in life. She’s broken countless hearts, poisoned nobles and warriors both, and has yet to fail a mission.
spy_antoinette_specialty: Antoinette automatically upgrades to a master spy.
spy_bortis_desc: A grizzled Zemyati, Bortis is an asset on and off the field. Rumor is that if he lives, he’ll become the next Spymaster.
spy_bortis_specialty: When Bortis rolls on expand network assignments, he generates +1 segment on his rolls.
spy_crimson_vexing_gale_desc: Little is known about this Panyar, except that their eyes reflect silver beneath a hood. They come and go as they please. Many rumors surround their past.
spy_igrid_desc: An Aldermark local, Igrid blends into all the settlements nearby. She travels the area freely, taking note of news and rumors.
spy_igrid_specialty: Whenever Igrid interrogates you may ask 1 additional intel question.
spy_liya_desc: This Bartan bears none of the usual Bartan jewelry signifying kinship and prefers deep cover and long-term solo missions. She’s also a master duelist, and a known Weaponmaster.
spy_network_acquisition_desc: Gain another spy. Mark their trained box.
spy_network_entrapment_desc: Spies roll +1d on Lay Trap missions.
spy_network_field_assignment_desc: You may ask 1 additional question when you interrogate.
spy_network_holy_orders_desc: augumented religious missions give +1 asset beyond the usual rewards.
spy_network_investments_desc: Spies roll +1d on expand network assignments.
spy_network_mercenaries_desc: augumented assault missions give +1 morale beyond the usual rewards.
spy_network_merchants_desc: augumented supply missions give +1 supply beyond the usual rewards.
spy_network_rangers_desc: augumented recon missions give +1 intel beyond the usual rewards.
spy_network_sources_desc: You have loyal contacts & informants everywhere. Spies roll +1d on augument mission assignments.
spy_network_spy_network_desc: You are able to train, support, and utilize spies. You start with 2 spies. One trained and one master spy.
spy_network_training_desc: One of your trained spies becomes a master spy. This may be taken twice.
spy_onyetin_desc: This friendly bear of a man is also one of the deadliest assassins in the Eastern Kingdoms. He knows exactly how to spot or uncover hidden targets and caches.
spy_onyetin_specialty: Onyetin rolls +1d on augument mission assignments.
supply_carts_desc: Spend 1 use of Food Stores when time passes or lose 2 morale. Carry up to 6 food per Food Store with Supply Carts.
supply_desc: Supply: Gain from mission rewards. Lose from mission penalties. If you lose supply and have none, lose 1 morale instead. Spend supply to boost campaign actions and to take additional campaign actions. You can keep a max of 3 supply +1 per Supply Cart (see Materiel below) when advancing.
supply_details: A measure of the Legion’s spare gear, liquid funds, and trade goods.
sway_desc: Sway someone with guile, charm, logic, or deception; change attitudes or behavior using manipulation or seduction; disguise yourself.
time_desc: TIME: Add 1 tick when time passes, or when you advance and roll pressure, and when missions have a time penalty. Reduce the clocks when mission rewards include time. If you do not complete the missions at Skydagger Keep before the last clock is filled, you lose the game.
time_details: How long you have to get to Skydagger, and how undead strength grows
weave_desc: When you use weave, you invoke arcane powers to change the world around you. Doing so is not without cost, and should always be considered extremely risky.
whichever_you_didnt_take_at_light_load: Whichever you didn't take at Light load.
wreck_desc: Wreck a place, item, or obstacle with savage force or careful sabotage; distract and sow chaos; breach defenses with force; use, throw, or place explosives or alchemicals; use siege weapons.
xp_condition_heavy: If you helped your squad through might or fortitude.
xp_condition_medic: If you helped your squad through medical knowledge or emotional comfort.
xp_condition_officer: If you helped your squad through enforcing discipline or strategic planning.
xp_condition_rookie: If you helped your squad by staying out of the way or surviving despite the odds.
xp_condition_scout: If you helped your squad through stealth or foresight.
xp_condition_sniper: If you helped your squad through keen observation or key shots.
xp_condition_soldier: If you helped your squad through courage or determination.
xp_desperate: Every time you roll a desperate action, mark xp in that action's attribute.
xp_heritage_trauma: If you brought into play your heritage or trauma (2 xp if you did both).
xp_specific: Enter your playbook-specific xp condition here.
xp_threat: Per highest Threat of opponent faced.
xp_top: At the end of each mission mark 1 xp (playbook or attribute)...
zerodice: Zero Dice — take the lowest result above
